name: ROWROW
description: “RowRow” is a unique sliding puzzle game with more than 100 level of hand crafted stages and diverse puzzle logics. This simple but challenging puzzle will tap into your creative mind.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any
